column1: '''An√≠ron''' is a song in the [[The Lord of the Rings (film series)|The Lord of the Rings film trilogy]] soundtrack
column2: composed and performed by [[Enya]]. It appears as part of track 10
column3: "[[The Council Of Elrond (soundtrack)|The Council of Elrond]]"

column3: is used as the love-theme of [[Aragorn]] and [[Arwen|Arwen Evenstar]].
